title: zbee-nwk-addr
description: The Zigbee Network Address Object represents one or more 16-bit addresses expressed in hexidecimal.

type.description: The value of this property MUST be `zbee-nwk-addr`.

value.description: Specifies one or more Zigbee Network addresses expressed in hexidecimal.

resolves_to_refs.description: Specifies a list of references to one or more 64-bit IEEE MAC address addresses that the Zigbee address resolves to.
